entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as 'he' and 'him'. The text states that Harry's broom had given a wild jerk and he swung off it.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: A person in the crowd who is whispering to someone. The text mentions Seamus as the one who asked if something happened to Harry's broom when Flint blocked him.

entities.name: flint
entities.description: A person mentioned as having blocked Harry. The text states that Seamus wondered if something had happened to Harry's broom when Flint blocked him.

relationships.description: The relationship between Harry and Flint is described as Flint blocking Harry. The text states that Seamus wondered if something had happened to Harry's broom when Flint blocked him.
